name: Simple Cache Demo 

on: [push]

jobs:
  cache-demo: 
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout Code 
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Cache demo
        uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: my-cache-folder
          key: demo-cache

      - name: Create a file 
        run: |
          mkdir -p my-cache-folder 
          echo "This will be cached inside the folder" > my-cache-folder/message.txt

      - name: Display files 
        run: cat my-cache-folder/message.txt
